programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Elephant, Giraffe and Rabbit sure know some moves. Join them as they count and dance!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Come ride through the town with your favorite BabyTV characters _ Baby Butterfly, Elephant, Giraffe, Sheep, Rabit and Squirrel. Riding a bus has never been more fun!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Come sing and dance along with Lola, Charlie, Billy and Bam Bam as they touch their head, nose, chin and arms!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Baby, Giraffe and Sheep have fun dancing in the rain with their umbrellas as Hippo tires to find some peace and quiet but keeps bumping his head.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: All your favorite BabTV characters are rolling over in the bed. Be careful not to fall out!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Mother Duck goes out with her five little ducklings. Each one is fascinated by something along the way. Luckily, they all find their way back in the end.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Toto and Robbie fly with their spaceship to wake up a sleepy star so it can shine through the night.

programs.title: Moonlight
programs.description: Calming visuals of abstract objects and nature, accompanied by soothing music for night time programming

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Meet the clever little teapot, short and stout. It has a little handle and spout, and when it sings and whistles, just pour it out.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Baby Butterfly tucks everyone in bed sending them off to a peaceful sleep _ Elephant, Draco, Oliver, Charlie and Lola. Good night everyone.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Elephant, Giraffe, Sheep and Baby wash, iron and mend their clothes, sweep and scrub the floor and bake bread. And then they all go round the mulberry bush on a cold and frosty morning!

programs.title: Magic Stars
programs.description: Let's slow down and change gears.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: When we meet somebody everywhere we go, we say hello. Ola, bonjour, hello _ "Hello" has different names _ in English, French or Spanish. Let's greet our friends from all around the world with a nice hello in their language.

programs.title: Let's Dance
programs.description: Get off your couch and start to move! Kids will love to dance and move to energetic music while interacting with animated characters. Come join the beat!

programs.title: Draco
programs.description: On his way to a trip, Draco puts his toys in a cart, but cannot pull it since there are too many of them in it. Join Draco as he learns the difference between "too heavy" and "lighter" as he empties out the toys from the cart and is able to pull it!

programs.title: Stitches
programs.description: Needles and Prickles are in an orange orchard. They want to pick oranges in order to make juice _ but the oranges are too high up on the tree! Will they be able to pick the oranges and make some juice? Come find out!

programs.title: Maya and Yaya
programs.description: Maya is jumping rope and Yaya is bouncing a ball. Yaya wants to jump rope as well but is having a hard time and falls down. Join the two cute elephants to see what Yaya can do _ he can turn around on his head! Come along and see how the two good friends have fun doing things together!

programs.title: By the Lake
programs.description: Your kids will love to relax with BabyTV's characters in a beautiful park with soothing classical music.

programs.title: Magic World
programs.description: "Magic World" is a captivating children's program on Baby TV, combining fun and education in every episode. The series showcases delightful animated characters who explore an enchanting realm filled with mythical creatures. Throughout their adventures, young viewers gain essential life lessons, stimulate their imaginations, and learn basic concepts like colors, shapes, and numbers. With its lively music, interactive segments, and engaging narratives, "Magic World" is crafted to entertain and educate the youngest audience, providing a safe and enriching environment for kids to discover and enjoy new experiences.

programs.title: Peek-a-boo with friends
programs.description: Your kids will love to relax with BabyTV's characters in a beautiful park with soothing classical music.

programs.title: Playing in the Park
programs.description: Your kids will love to relax with BabyTV's characters in a beautiful park with soothing classical music.

programs.title: Charlie & the Alphabet
programs.description: Charlie searches for the letter A who has picked all the apples off the apple tree. When he finds her he discovers she has no apples left, but she has something even better _ apple pie!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Lola has fun with all your favorite characters from the Tiny Bunch. Come join them as they sing the favorite classic "This Old Man".

programs.title: Mini Matinee
programs.description: Join the loveable animal friends as they visit El Salvador. King Hernandez is always worried and can't sleep! Join the King as he discovers the gardener's hammock! Enjoy a relaxing Siesta with the King!

programs.title: Beep Beep
programs.description: Voom Vam participates in a dance contest and returns home with the blues. Roady and Trucky try to cheer her up. Once they turn up the music it's hard not to move your feet!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Come join all your favorite BabyTV friends as they have fun dancing like babies, ride in hot-air balloons, meet a magician, and have wagon races

programs.title: Travelers
programs.description: Two very different and funny travelers, the level-headed Perry and the mischievous Harley, discover that there is more than one way to solve a problem.

programs.title: Walter and Dude
programs.description: Walter and Dude are looking for an item that froths, has a lovely smell and cleans. Is it a flower, whipped cream or a vacuum cleaner? Join them as they discover it's soap!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Baby butterfly picks roses and meets friends along the way _ Hippo, Elephant, Turtle and more. Careful not to sneeze!

programs.title: Olly
programs.description: Kitty can't get out of her house _ there's a big rock blocking her way! Luckily Olly the crane operator is here to save the day.

programs.title: Bug'n'Play to the Rescue
programs.description: Laz, Hop and Butterson find a creative way to make a waterslide in the back yard. The fun ends when the tap is stuck and the waterflow stops. The buggy friends manage to turn it back on with a shoelace! Let the fun continue!

programs.title: Happy Birthday To You
programs.description: Make your child a star on BabyTV by creating their very own personalized birthday greeting. Using a digital photo, parents can create a clip for their child which can be viewed online or submitted to BabyTV for the chance of being featured on-air.

programs.title: Cuddlies
programs.description: Tickles puts on a funny show for his friends and can't stop sneezing! His friends help him to bed and bring him a whistle to blow in case he needs anything. When Tickles doesn't stop blowing the whistle, his friends realize that he doesn't really need anything except for them to be together!

programs.title: Bath Tubbies
programs.description: Ellie and Ducky are having fun playing with paint! Ellie wants to sleep but is covered with paint splashes! What shall he do? Join Ellie and Ducky as they clean themselves in the bath. Oh no! Ellie still can't sleep, but once Ducky returns, Ellie can finally fall asleep! Good Night!

programs.title: Jump Out of Bed Sleepy Head
programs.description: Want to help the court jesters wake up the cook, the gardener and the King and Queen? Come help them solve some puzzles!

programs.title: Egg Band
programs.description: Have you ever sung along with Pirates? Now you can! Join the Egg Band pirates as you clap your hands and stomp your feet!

programs.title: The World is a Wonder
programs.description: Join Gaya the Fairy as she visits the beaver. The beaver is very busy building a dam to hold back the water so he can reach the female beaver across the island.

programs.title: Zeina's Detective Agency
programs.description: A highly familiar day-to-day object arrives at Zeina's doorstep forgetting what it is used for. Searching for the answer, Zeina and her best friend Roy come up with a new and hilarious use for the surprised object. While they all have a great time with its new use, the object's true use is revealed to them.

programs.title: Welcome to the Island
programs.description: It's Coco's birthday and the gang have planned a surprise party for him! They even invited the Coral Reef singers! Now that's a real treat!

programs.title: Teeny and Tiny's Classroom
programs.description: Teeny and Tiny count together, use a carrot as a nose and build a tall tower together.

programs.title: Mike's Bikes
programs.description: Petite is dressed up as a cute little mouse and she wants her bike to be dressed up, too. Will Mikey have a costume for her bike?

programs.title: Stick with Mick
programs.description: Mick wants to play with his new doggie. Join Mick as he has lots of fun playing "fetch the ball" with his doggie, giving him water in a water bowl, entering the dog house along with his doggie and takings him on a nice walk using a leash!

programs.title: Crafty Rafty
programs.description: Come along and have lots of fun with corks! The bottle shakes and the cork pops! Come along and enjoy the breathtaking images created from corks! Join Crafty Rafty as he creates a man with a feathered hat! See the girl with thumbtacks as earphones! Dance along with the cork creatures and have a ball!

programs.title: Billy Bam Bam
programs.description: Billy and BamBam have fun making pictures out of dry leaves from the garden. Join them as they clean the mess they made and play an imaginative game with dusters, pretending to be chickens with crests!

programs.title: Jungle Book
programs.description: If you want to explore the beautiful jungle, you must look, listen, and... smell. This way, you'll know exactly when the rain is coming! Can you think of creative ways to make a shelter?

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Toto, Robbie and Dolly are all busy baking a cake! After pouring all the ingredients in the pan Robbie uses his hand as a whip to whip them all up. Come see as they take the cake out of the oven and top it with sprinkles!

programs.title: Look What I Found
programs.description: Join the friends as they play in a sandbox! Use a spade and fill the bucket with golden sand! Come along and use toy spades as oars to row the bucket boat! Sail on a river through magical castles and into the sea! Swim with dolphins and hear the ocean in a seashell! Slide down the hill back into the sandbox!

programs.title: Maya and Yaya
programs.description: Maya and Yaya have a wonderful time playing with a ball until it gets stuck in a banana tree. Join the two cute elephants as they try to figure out how to get it down. Can the fly who went by help out? Come along and join the fun!

programs.title: Snowies fun and frosty guessing games
programs.description: Snowies fun and frosty guessing games

programs.title: Egg Band
programs.description: Do you also like to draw on the sand? Come watch the Egg Band draw geometrical shapes.

programs.title: Pix & Leo
programs.description: What is everyone up to today? Mixing water and soap, making pink soap bubbles! It's fun to make bubbles, but it's much more fun to float in them.

programs.title: My Robot & I
programs.description: Robots can really come in handy when searching for a lost frisbee in the bushes. Join Kim as she marvels at Kit's ability to trim bushes in the shape of animals!

programs.title: Ahoy Pirates
programs.description: Embark on an adventure with Captain Katie, Jon Jon and Beth and help them find the hidden treasure. It won't be easy! You'll have to solve riddles and puzzles along the way.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Come join the fun as Bambam mischievously tries to frighten Billy as she peacefully eats her curds and whey

programs.title: Walter and Dude
programs.description: Walter and Dude the Dog are looking for an item to speak with, has buttons to press, and goes "ring ring". Is it a megaphone, a television, or a bell? Join the two friends as they discover it's a telephone! Hello!

programs.title: Tutti Frutti
programs.description: Tutti and Frutti put on a spectacular show for all their friends with a great performance of Grieg's Morning mood from Peer Gynt.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Baby Butterfly and all your favorite friends are here to sing and dance to Here We Go Looby Loo. Come on and join Hippo, Elephant, Giraffe and more and do the Looby loo!

programs.title: Welcome to the Island
programs.description: A little flower has grown next to Lily, and everyone seems to like it but Lily. But when the little flower can't fall asleep, Lily is the only one who can help him.

programs.title: Big Bugs Band
programs.description: Let's Samba! Join the Big Bugs Band on their journey to the wonderful world of Brazilian music as they have fun playing various musical instruments. Come and enjoy as the bugs have a fun time dancing Samba before a cheering audience of fellow animals in the woods.

programs.title: Travelers
programs.description: Harley and Perry go on a visit to the botanical gardens. They water the flowers and watch them bloom. There is one stubborn flower that just won't bloom! Will Harley and Perry be able to help?

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Meet the clever little teapot, short and stout. It has a little handle and spout, and when it sings and whistles, just pour it out.

programs.title: Charlie & the Numbers
programs.description: Join Charlie and Number Six on their search for the missing ingredient for the never-ending cake. Climb a rainbow, pick six cloud pieces and see how the beautiful cake is made and then join Charlie and Number Six on their way to the Numbers Party!

programs.title: Teeny and Tiny's Classroom
programs.description: Come sing along with Teeny and Tiny as they hum a tune, solve riddles, and play guessing games.

programs.title: Giggle Wiggle
programs.description: It's hot! Even for a lizard! So better start hopping and skipping if you don't want to scorch your feet!

programs.title: Snail Trail
programs.description: Can you whistle? Join Mr. Snail as he looks for guinea pig _ the champion whistler! Learn how to whistle like a guinea pig! Press your lips, blow and enjoy the wonderful show!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Hey, Diddle, Diddle is a joyful nursery rhyme that dates back to the sixteenth century and sings of a fiddle-playing cat, a delighted cow, a curious dog, a dish, and a spoon. Adorable characters that every toddler has fun with playing, dancing, and singing along.

programs.title: Happy Birthday To You
programs.description: Make your child a star on BabyTV by creating their very own personalized birthday greeting. Using a digital photo, parents can create a clip for their child which can be viewed online or submitted to BabyTV for the chance of being featured on-air.

programs.title: Bug'n'Play to the Rescue
programs.description: What a pleasant surprise _ there's a rubber duck in the yard! Butterson finds himself stranded in the middle of a puddle on the fubber duck. Luckily, Hop has an idea how to save the day

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Lola, Charlie and Henry are baking a delicous cake together. Come find out what you need in order to make the perfect cake!

programs.title: Zeina's Detective Agency
programs.description: A highly familiar day-to-day object arrives at Zeina's doorstep forgetting what it is used for. Searching for the answer, Zeina and her best friend Roy come up with a new and hilarious use for the surprised object. While they all have a great time with its new use, the object's true use is revealed to them.

programs.title: Billy Bam Bam
programs.description: Billy and BamBam enjoy playing hide and seek with their dolls. Come hop along and have fun with them as they pretend to be jumping kangaroos with baby kangaroos inside their pockets!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Baby Hippo is learning how to walk. On his way he meets a flying butterfly, a jumping frog and a crawling snail.

programs.title: Look What I Found
programs.description: The friends have an amazing time covering themselves up with a blanket! Join the fun as the blanket turns into a terrific tent! Step outside and follow the butterflies! Enjoy a fine picnic eating tasty raspberries before going back home!

programs.title: Snowies fun and frosty guessing games
programs.description: Snowies fun and frosty guessing games

programs.title: Charlie & the Shapes
programs.description: Can you stand on your head? Come see blue triangle, orange triangle and line compete who can stand on their head the longest. When the shapes start to argue, Charlie needs to find them a game in which they don't compete.

programs.title: Cuddlies
programs.description: Tickles is in a mischievous mood and brings a toy egg with a popping out chicken to a picnic with his friends. Dodo throws the tiny egg and it breaks, so he decides to fix it. Join them as Tickles builds a new egg, and they both end up having fun and playing with the new toy eggs!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Elephant, Giraffe, Sheep and Baby wash, iron and mend their clothes, sweep and scrub the floor and bake bread. And then they all go round the mulberry bush on a cold and frosty morning!

programs.title: Mike's Bikes
programs.description: Petite can't reach the seat of her bicycle. It is too high. What can Mikey do to help her? Let's see...

programs.title: Pix & Leo
programs.description: Pix and Leo are envious of the chicks getting a flying lesson from mama bird. They also want to fly. But flying without wings is not so easy...

programs.title: Olly
programs.description: Kitty's garden has gotten out of hand! Olly the gardener has fun mowing the grass and pretending to be a scarecrow.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: The Tiny Bunch gang are happy, and they know it! Baby, Elephant, Rabbit, Giraffe, Hippo and Turtle all join in to sing and dance "If You're Happy and You Know It"! Come join them!

programs.title: Beep Beep
programs.description: Trucky declares a "Cleaning Day!" and the three friends clean up all the litter that has scattered around the lake. A strong wind points them in the direction of what started the mess in the first place.

programs.title: Crafty Rafty
programs.description: Have fun with cardboard people, driving around in cardboard cars and having a cardboard picnic.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Charlie has fun in the Bath! Join him as he washes his hair, scrubs himself with soap, makes bubbles and plays with his rubber duck. When he's nice and clean he puts on his pajamas and goes to bed. Good night Charlie!

programs.title: My Robot & I
programs.description: Kim and Kit are watering the vegetable patch. They vegetables need to wait patiently until Kit learns how to turn on the faucet and use the hose. Can and help him!

programs.title: Happy Birthday To You
programs.description: Make your child a star on BabyTV by creating their very own personalized birthday greeting. Using a digital photo, parents can create a clip for their child which can be viewed online or submitted to BabyTV for the chance of being featured on-air.

programs.title: Mini Matinee
programs.description: Join the loveable animal friends as they visit Madagascar. Dayo is looking for a blue seashell. Numsa tells him she dreamt she found one under a tamarisk tree! Dig with Dayo and find the unique seashell!

programs.title: Egg Band
programs.description: Shapes are everywhere! Can you find them? The wheels of the bus are circles, the windows in the house are squares and the road signs are rectangles. What other shapes can you find?

programs.title: The World is a Wonder
programs.description: Join Gaia the Fairy as she explores the wide desert, the boiling hot days and starry nights, the motions of the sun and the moon over the sand, the sunrise and sunset.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Meet the clever little teapot, short and stout. It has a little handle and spout, and when it sings and whistles, just pour it out.

programs.title: Play & Learn with the Post Train
programs.description: It's Barry the Bear's birthday! Join Fast Frank as he rushes off to deliver a package from Paul the Penguin! Hop on the train and help find Barry! Enjoy the beach and park on the way! Come find Barry in a cold snowy valley with fish and trees! Discover what's inside the package! A fishing rod, of course!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: All My Friends is a fun and cheerful children's rhyme with Lola, Charlie, Henry, Oliver, and Draco signing happily together about friends.

programs.title: Jungle Book
programs.description: It's pineapple day! What does that mean? It's the day the great pineapple ripens and all the animals fest on it together near the lake. But the mischievous Shere-Khan has plans of his own for the great pineapple....

programs.title: Ahoy Pirates
programs.description: Captain Katie, Jon Jon and Beth set out on an adventure to find the pirate treasure. They will need to solve riddles and puzzles along the way. It won't be easy! Come join them on their adventure!

programs.title: What a Wonderful Day
programs.description: Good Morning! Join the amazing friends as they get ready for a wonderful day! Wake up as the bright sun tickles your eyes and sing a song! Brush your teeth, comb your hair and eat a tasty breakfast! Skip and hop, laugh and play and have a fantastic day! Hooray!

programs.title: Stick with Mick
programs.description: Mick is going to the indoor playground. Join Mick as he rides in a push car and jumps on a trampoline! Come along and jump inside an inflatable castle and have fun playing in a pool of balls!

programs.title: BabyTV Studios
programs.description: Take a ride on the ski lift and hit the slopes with Zoe and Dodo. A great day of skiing always ends with a snowball fight!

programs.title: Walter and Dude
programs.description: Walter and Dude the Dog are looking for an item that you take on a bike ride, keeps you safe, and wear on your head. Is it a clown's hat, a fruit basket, or perhaps Walter himself? Join the two friends as they discover it's a bicycle helmet!

programs.title: Tutti Frutti
programs.description: Tutti and Frutti put on a spectacular show for all their friends with a great performance of Laurel and Hardy.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Good morning, Friends, and a happy new day! The sun is smiling, the butterflies are singing, the birds are chirping and calling out your name. It's time to wake up and start the day with laughter with Baby and friends.

programs.title: Welcome to the Island
programs.description: Mama bird builds a nest on Coco for her little chicks but Coco isn't happy with all the commotion. When the bird goes to get more twigs, one of the chicks almost falls out of the nest! Luckily Coco is there to save the day.

programs.title: Big Bugs Band
programs.description: Bravo! Join the Big Bugs Band on their journey to the wonderful world of Classical music as they have fun playing various musical instruments, singing various arias before a cheering audience of fellow animals in the woods.

programs.title: Travelers
programs.description: Two very different and funny travelers, the level-headed Perry and the mischievous Harley, discover that there is more than one way to solve a problem.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Join Little Lola, papa, and farm friends in this cheery BabyTV version of the famous rhyme, Johhny Johnny Yes Papa. Papa offers Lola healthy veggies and dessert instead of catching her eating sugar.

programs.title: Charlie & the Numbers
programs.description: On their way to find Princess Number Two's crown, she and Charlie encounter various "two" objects including clowns and clouds. After Charlie makes her a crown of flowers, the original crown is found and the two friends set out to the Numbers Party!

programs.title: Teeny and Tiny's Classroom
programs.description: Come sing along with Teeny and Tiny as they hum a tune, solve riddles, and play guessing games.

programs.title: Giggle Wiggle
programs.description: Ready to run, jump, hop turn around and touch the ground? Then get yourself a rabbit and come join me!

programs.title: Snail Trail
programs.description: Mr. Snail and country mouse are visiting city mouse in the city! Join them as they discover tasty cheese in the rubbish! Cat discovers the cheese as well! Who will enjoy the feast?

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Billy and Bam have fun watching the bears make food together. Sometimes things don't go quite as expected but that's part of the fun.

programs.title: Happy Birthday To You
programs.description: Make your child a star on BabyTV by creating their very own personalized birthday greeting. Using a digital photo, parents can create a clip for their child which can be viewed online or submitted to BabyTV for the chance of being featured on-air.

programs.title: Bug'n'Play to the Rescue
programs.description: The buggy friends pick some berries for lunch. When one of the berries falls into the water, Butterson jumps in after it! Laz and Hop need to help him out of the water before he reaches the waterfall!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: The ants march along carrying cherries, oranges and other goodies from the picnic basket and find shelter from the rain.

programs.title: Zeina's Detective Agency
programs.description: A planter arrives at Zeina's doorstep, forgetting what it is used for. Using her detective skill and her best friend Roy, Zeina discovers that a planter is used for sailing... is it?

programs.title: Billy Bam Bam
programs.description: Billy and BamBam have fun making a pile of colourful stones in the garden and playing together on land and sea. Join them as they use a chalkstone to draw arrows and signs and play follow me!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Come pick potatoes with your favorite BabyTV friends _ Hippo, elephant, Squirrel, Rabbit and Baby!

programs.title: Look What I Found
programs.description: The friends play in a pond with an umbrella as the umbrella becomes a boat and they go into sea, where they meat dolphins and end up on a beach.

programs.title: Snowies fun and frosty guessing games
programs.description: Snowies fun and frosty guessing games

programs.title: Charlie & the Shapes
programs.description: Yellow rectangle, orange triangle and Charlie go searching for Arrow with the help of the map he has left for them. All they need to do is find the bushes, circle the tree, cross the bridge and go around the hill. Will they be able to find arrow.? Come find out!

programs.title: Cuddlies
programs.description: Yum Yum loves spending lots of time at his new tomato patch. His friends want to play ball and music by it, but Yum Yum prefers to be alone in his patch, so his friends go away. Join Yum Yum as he finds a creative way to bring his friends back and enjoy a nice tomato-themed dinner with them!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: When we meet somebody everywhere we go, we say hello. Ciao, Konnichi wa, Marhaba _ "Hello" has different names _ in Italian, Japanese or Arabic. Let's greet our friends from all around the world with a nice hello in their language.

programs.title: Mike's Bikes
programs.description: Petite has a serious problem _ she can't stop her bike! Who is she going to turn to for help? Mikey of course!

programs.title: Pix & Leo
programs.description: Yay! It's Leo's birthday today and Pix is planning the perfect party. But, sh... sh... sh... it's a surprise. Careful not to wake Leo.

programs.title: Olly
programs.description: Olly, a 3 year old playful monkey, loves to play dress-up along with his toy friends, Kitty, Dolly and Snail. What will he be today? A bus driver? A doctor? Or maybe a dancer!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: The Itsy-Bitsy Spider is trying to climb the waterspout, but with no luck. The rain keeps washing it out. Perhaps the sun can help the poor little spider?

programs.title: Beep Beep
programs.description: Roady and Voom Vam play outside looking for puddles. Voom Vam finds it hard to see when the rain starts to fall, and her wiper is broken. Trucky comes to the rescue and manages to get Voom Vam out of the puddle.

programs.title: Crafty Rafty
programs.description: Come along and have a fun picnic outdoors! See the green lizard on a tree, blossoming flowers, honey making bees and a bird's egg in a nest! Join Crafty Rafty as he creates an amazing choo choo train using a bucket, plates and water bottle and a butterfly out of paper!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Five little monkeys jumping on the bed! Can you guess what happens? One falls off and bumps his head! Somebody call the doctor!

programs.title: My Robot & I
programs.description: Robots can really come in handy when searching for a lost frisbee in the bushes. Join Kim as she marvels at Kit's ability to trim bushes in the shape of animals!

programs.title: Happy Birthday To You
programs.description: Make your child a star on BabyTV by creating their very own personalized birthday greeting. Using a digital photo, parents can create a clip for their child which can be viewed online or submitted to BabyTV for the chance of being featured on-air.

programs.title: Mini Matinee
programs.description: Join the loveable animal friends as they visit the Wild West! Watch pioneers as they park their wagon in a canyon and meet Native Americans! Come and have fun toasting marshmallows around the bonfire!

programs.title: Egg Band
programs.description: A new upbeat version to the classic Wheels on the bus. Join the Egg Band as they sing in the park, play with kites, dolls, balls and more!

programs.title: The World is a Wonder
programs.description: Join Gaya the Fairy as she explores Antarctica's faraway continent, the little penguin family, their cold habitat, food, and lifecycle.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Join Little Lola, papa, and farm friends in this cheery BabyTV version of the famous rhyme, Johhny Johnny Yes Papa. Papa offers Lola healthy veggies and dessert instead of catching her eating sugar.

programs.title: Play & Learn with the Post Train
programs.description: Join Fast Frank as he rushes off to deliver a package for Zoe the Zebra from Barry the Bear! Hop on the train and help find Zoe! Enjoy the desert and park on the way! Come find Zoe in the hot and open spaced Savanna filled with grass! Discover what's inside the package! Running shoes!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Billy and Bam Bam continue to play pretend and have fun singing the classic rhyme Miss Polly had a Dolly and treat Billy's doll who is sick.

programs.title: Jungle Book
programs.description: If you want to explore the beautiful jungle, you must look, listen, and... smell. This way, you'll know exactly when the rain is coming! Can you think of creative ways to make a shelter?

programs.title: Ahoy Pirates
programs.description: Captain Katie, Jon Jon and Beth set out on an adventure to find the pirate treasure. They will need to solve riddles and puzzles along the way. It won't be easy! Come join them on their adventure!

programs.title: What a Wonderful Day
programs.description: Join the amazing friends as they enjoy lunch time together! The sun is high in the sky! Eat a delicious and healthy lunch with butterflies and buzzing bees! Now it's time to rest! Come along and take a nice nap on the soft hammocks!

programs.title: Stick with Mick
programs.description: Anybody hungry? Join Mick as he visits the vegetable garden, waters the plant with a watering can and picks some tomatoes, lettuce and carrots for a nice healthy salad he prepares and enjoys with his friends. Bon Appetit!

programs.title: BabyTV Studios
programs.description: Is your child good at drawing? Maybe he'll be the next Leonardo De Vinci! Meanwhile watch him draw the Mona Lisa.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Little Cabin in the Woods is a popular and fun song that teaches toddlers and young children colors and shapes with yummy fruits. Join Baby TV's friends as they have fun learning and eating a strawberry, a banana, a plum, and an apple together.

programs.title: Walter and Dude
programs.description: Walter and Dude the Dog are looking for an item that you take on a bike ride, keeps you safe, and wear on your head. Is it a clown's hat, a fruit basket, or perhaps Walter himself? Join the two friends as they discover it's a bicycle helmet!

programs.title: Tutti Frutti
programs.description: Tutti and Frutti put on a spectacular show for all their friends with a great performance of Laurel and Hardy.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: The brave mouse wants to join his friend the bird on the cuckoo clock. He tries climbing, jumping, and flying until he finally manages to unite with his friend.

programs.title: Welcome to the Island
programs.description: Mama bird builds a nest on Coco for her little chicks but Coco isn't happy with all the commotion. When the bird goes to get more twigs, one of the chicks almost falls out of the nest! Luckily Coco is there to save the day.

programs.description: Join Little Lola, papa, and farm friends in this cheery BabyTV version of the famous rhyme, Johhny Johnny Yes Papa. Papa offers Lola healthy veggies and dessert instead of catching her eating sugar.

programs.title: Charlie & the Numbers
programs.description: Join Charlie and Number Five as they try to find help blowing up five balloons. On the way, they see five birds and a colorful rainbow until they find the wind that helps blow up the balloons, before they set out to have fun at the Numbers Party!

programs.description: Come sing along with Teeny and Tiny as they hum a tune, solve riddles, and play guessing games.

programs.title: Ahoy Pirates
programs.description: Captain Katie, Jon Jon and Beth set out on an adventure to find the pirate treasure. They will need to solve riddles and puzzles along the way. It won't be easy! Come join them on their adventure!

programs.title: What a Wonderful Day
programs.description: It's afternoon! Join the fun and play in the playground! Watch the robin and lark as they clean their lovely nest! Dream on the grass and have a fine rest! Come along, feel free to be happy _ you and me! Swing along and sing a nice song!

programs.title: Stick with Mick
programs.description: Anybody hungry? Join Mick as he visits the vegetable garden, waters the plant with a watering can and picks some tomatoes, lettuce and carrots for a nice healthy salad he prepares and enjoys with his friends. Bon Appetit!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Bam Bam wants to do everything Billy does _ but it's not always easy! Join the cutest sibling duo as they try to whistle, bounce a basketball and rub their tummy while rubbing their head. Remember _ practice makes perfect!

programs.title: BabyTV Studios
programs.description: Is your child good at drawing? Maybe he'll be the next Leonardo De Vinci! Meanwhile watch him draw the Mona Lisa.

programs.title: Charlie & the Alphabet
programs.description: Charlie is afraid to get his teeth checked by D the dentist. He runs away and finds himself in the forest of doors. Will he be able to find his way out and agree to have his teeth examined?

programs.title: Mini Matinee
programs.description: Join the loveable animal friends as they visit Jordan. Khaled offers to paint his sisters' tent. Saeed mixes red and pink petals to create a powder! The wind blows it! Search for it and find a pink palace!

programs.title: Beep Beep
programs.description: Voom Vam gets a bad case of the hiccups. Roady and Trucky try everything they can think of to cure her, but nothing seems to work. After holding her breath, counting backwards and getting a fright there is only one thing left to do...

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Toto, Robbie and Dolly are all busy baking a cake! After pouring all the ingredients in the pan Robbie uses his hand as a whip to whip them all up. Come see as they take the cake out of the oven and top it with sprinkles!

programs.title: Travelers
programs.description: Harley and Perry go on a visit to the botanical gardens. They water the flowers and watch them bloom. There is one stubborn flower that just won't bloom! Will Harley and Perry be able to help?

programs.title: Walter and Dude
programs.description: Walter and Dude are looking for an item that is round, has a hole and helps you swim. Is it a bagel, a rubber duckie or a balloon? Join them as they discover it's a rubber ring!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Five little monkeys jumping on the bed! Can you guess what happens? One falls off and bumps his head! Somebody call the doctor!

programs.title: Olly
programs.description: Olly's adventure is out of this world! He's flying to the moon and Kitty, Dolly and Snail join in on the fun!

programs.title: Bug'n'Play to the Rescue
programs.description: The buggy friends find a trampoline in the yard and are eager to start jumping. Butterson gets stuck in the trampoline and Laz and Hop find a creative way to help him out.

programs.title: Happy Birthday To You
programs.description: Make your child a star on BabyTV by creating their very own personalized birthday greeting. Using a digital photo, parents can create a clip for their child which can be viewed online or submitted to BabyTV for the chance of being featured on-air.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Little Lola has fun staying home playing with her pets. She throws her dog a stick and gives some milk to her cat. Pets are fun!

programs.title: Cuddlies
programs.description: Yum Yum loves spending lots of time at his new tomato patch. His friends want to play ball and music by it, but Yum Yum prefers to be alone in his patch, so his friends go away. Join Yum Yum as he finds a creative way to bring his friends back and enjoy a nice tomato-themed dinner with them!

programs.title: Bath Tubbies
programs.description: Ducky, Ellie and Froggy are having lots of fun playing hide and seek. Join Ducky as he climbs on a rock to find the friends but discovers a cute turtle! Where can the friends be? Come along and find Froggy in a bucket and Ellie in a rubber ring with his trunk sticking out!

programs.title: Jump Out of Bed Sleepy Head
programs.description: Let's solve some riddles, play some games and wake up the castle! Jump out of bed everyone!

programs.title: Egg Band
programs.description: Join the Egg Band in this colorful song celebrating colors! Red, blue, green, yellow, purple pink, and white will join in the fun.

programs.title: The World is a Wonder
programs.description: Join Gaya the Fairy as she explores the sunflower, its growth, and how the sunflower follows _ the sun.

programs.title: Zeina's Detective Agency
programs.description: A highly familiar day-to-day object arrives at Zeina's doorstep forgetting what it is used for. Searching for the answer, Zeina and her best friend Roy come up with a new and hilarious use for the surprised object. While they all have a great time with its new use, the object's true use is revealed to them.

programs.title: Welcome to the Island
programs.description: It's an exciting day on the island when a turtle and her numerous kids arrive on the island. In all the commotion, mama turtle finds herself flat on her back! Come see how she gets herself out of this predicament

programs.title: Teeny and Tiny's Classroom
programs.description: Teeny and Tiny play what is hiding beneath the handkerchief, the animal game, and imaginary games.

programs.title: Mike's Bikes
programs.description: Johnny wants to ride his bike and fly his kite at the same time. But that's no easy task! Who is he going to turn to for help? Mikey of course!

programs.title: Stick with Mick
programs.description: Mick wants to clean up his messy room. Join Mick as he puts away all his toys, a teddy bear, a toy car, and blocks in a toy box! Come along and see Mick as he puts his lovely dolls in a dollhouse and clothes in a closet! What a neat room!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: The Itsy-Bitsy Spider is trying to climb the waterspout, but with no luck. The rain keeps washing it out. Perhaps the sun can help the poor little spider?

programs.title: Crafty Rafty
programs.description: Come along and have lots of fun with egg cartons! Hop on the carton choo choo train with pasta wheels! Travel through magical carton mountains and noodle trees! See the chick in the spaghetti nest! Join Crafty Rafty as he creates cute carton rabbits!

programs.title: Billy Bam Bam
programs.description: Billy and BamBam go out to the garden to take down the washing. Join them as they have fun playing an imaginative game with the washing basket, turning it into a boat, splashing with paddles and sailing the sea!

programs.title: Jungle Book
programs.description: The jungle has a lot of surprises. Today the students learn how to move without anyone seeing them with the best and sneakiest teacher ever _ Kaa!

programs.title: Look What I Found
programs.description: The friends have fun playing with a pot and a wooden spoon! The pot flips over and turns into a drum! Come along and play wonderful music before a lovely audience of sweet sheep! Join the parade and come back home on a musical note!

programs.title: Maya and Yaya
programs.description: Maya and Yaya bake a delicious cake in honour of their friend Momo's upcoming visit. While Yaya goes to bring plates, spoons and napkins, Maya keeps an eye on the cake but winds up eating it all up! Join the two cute elephants to see the surprise that Momo brings along _ a brand new cake!

programs.title: Snowies fun and frosty guessing games
programs.description: Come play a cool guessing game in the snow with the adorable snowies! Guess which animal makes a gobble sound! Is it a dog or a frog? Join the cute snowman friends and have lots of fun as they create a terrific turkey!

programs.title: Egg Band
programs.description: The Egg Band sings one of the classics _ BINGO. Come join them and learn how to spell along the way!

programs.title: Pix & Leo
programs.description: Yay! It's a sunny day at the beach for Pix and Leo. Oh, but who is sneaking behind the tree and squirting water on them? Hmmm... Who could it be?

programs.title: My Robot & I
programs.description: Kim wants Kit to be her audience while she sings, but Kit wants to perform too. If they perform together, who will be their audience? Come find out!

programs.title: Ahoy Pirates
programs.description: Ahoy everyone! Are you ready for an adventure? Come join Captain Kaite, Jon Jon and Beth as they set sail to find the treasure.

programs.title: Maya and Yaya
programs.description: Maya and Yaya are having fun playing hide and go seek in the woods. Where can they be? Maybe behind the bush or behind the tree? Join the two cute elephants as they enjoy playing with each other and with Momo who joins the game and plays with them all day until it's time for the friends to go home!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: "One, two, buckle my shoe; Three, four, shut the door…" Counting is the best! Let's join Charlie & the Numbers in this popular and cheerful song and count from one to ten.

programs.title: Draco
programs.description: Join Draco as he learns the difference between opposites _ in front of and behind. Draco has fun playing hide and go seek, and learns the concept of "in front of" versus 'behind', as he enjoys hiding in front of and behind the ball and block.

programs.title: Let's Dance
programs.description: Get off your couch and start to move! Kids will love to dance and move to energetic music while interacting with animated characters. Come join the beat!

programs.title: Kiku at the Home
programs.description: It's time to relax, slow down and unwind with Kiku. Calming visuals and soft music are great ways to prepare for bed.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Elephant and Hippo go on a picnic on their boat. Elephant manages to catch a fish but ouch! He got bitten! Come count the fish along with Baby, Hippo and Elephant.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: The ants march along carrying cherries, oranges and other goodies from the picnic basket and find shelter from the rain.

programs.title: Grandpa Joe's Magical Playground
programs.description: Join Grandpa Joe and friends to see the surprise they build with magical parts! Connect the wheels, ring and parts to create a hot air balloon! Join the ride and use a telescope to see the amazing world from above!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Everyone shares in the fun when singing Ten Green Bottles. Baby, Hippo, Elephant, Turtle, Sheep, Rabbit, Squirrel and Giraffe all manage to knock off one of the bottles until there are no bottles left.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: In this fun and popular counting rhyme for kids, the five little hungry mice are climbing a pot of rice to have a yummy feast.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: The entire family is having fun playing football outside when it starts raining! With a little help from their imagination, the family finds a fun way of playing football indoors!

programs.title: LaLe Ki LoLu
programs.description: Lale and Lolu explore the magical world of the orient in winter. They cross bridges, sail on boats and fly on a dragon.

programs.title: Musical Melody
programs.description: Join the delightful musicians as they play fine sounds of Rondo by Mozart. Step into the stunning world of classical music as you have fun in the playground riding on slides and swings and listening to chirping birds!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Charlie has fun in the Bath! Join him as he washes his hair, scrubs himself with soap, makes bubbles and plays with his rubber duck. When he's nice and clean he puts on his pajamas and goes to bed. Good night Charlie!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Put on your leg warmers and join the fun as Squirrel, Elephant, Hippo, Sheep and Rabbit shape up while touching their head, shoulders, knees, and toes!

programs.title: Bath Tubbies
programs.description: Ducky, Ellie and Froggy are having lots of fun playing hide and seek. Join Ducky as he climbs on a rock to find the friends but discovers a cute turtle! Where can the friends be? Come along and find Froggy in a bucket and Ellie in a rubber ring with his trunk sticking out!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Come pick potatoes with your favorite BabyTV friends _ Hippo, elephant, Squirrel, Rabbit and Baby!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Old King Cole was a merry old soul, and a merry old soul was he. Join Old King Cole and his three fiddlers in this merry folk nursery rhyme.

programs.title: Good Night Teddy Bear
programs.description: Teddy is getting ready for bed! He tells Mama Bear about his adventures with a friendly cloud! Betty Bear and Teddy walk in the park on a hot summer's day! A cloud cools them down by pouring rain! Come along and see how rain fills Daisy Duck's pool and Franky Frog's pond! Come help cloud water the pretty flowers and make them happy again!

programs.title: Maya and Yaya
programs.description: Yaya is building a tower of blocks. Maya wants to jump, do a cartwheel and play ball. The ball ruins the tower, even though Maya didn't mean it. Join the two cute elephants as they try to build the tower again, taking turns placing the building blocks on top of each other! What a tall tower!

programs.title: Draco
programs.description: Come join Draco for a pleasant ride as he learns the difference between "slow" and "fast", alternately driving slower and faster in his car after attaching the missing wheel on to it.

programs.title: Let's Dance
programs.description: Get off your couch and start to move! Kids will love to dance and move to energetic music while interacting with animated characters. Come join the beat!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Come join all your favorite BabyTV friends as they have fun dancing like babies, ride in hot-air balloons, meet a magician, and have wagon races

programs.title: Stitches
programs.description: Needles, Racky, Hoppy, Bouncy and Castor all have fun at the playground. They play on the seesaw, the swing and with a skipping rope. A great time is had by all!

programs.title: Grandpa Joe's Magical Playground
programs.description: Join Grandpa Joe and friends to see the surprise they build with magical parts! Connect the pyramid, ball, wheels and parts to create a fantastic Ferris wheel! Come along and have lots of fun riding way up high!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Billy and Bam have fun watching the bears make food together. Sometimes things don't go quite as expected but that's part of the fun.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Come clap your hands and stomp your feet with Lola as she rides horses and goes on a picnic with grandpa and grandma.

programs.title: LaLe Ki LoLu
programs.description: Lale and Lolu climb tall pyramids and play ancient ball games in the jungle.

programs.title: Musical Melody
programs.description: Join the musicians as they play beautiful sounds of Spring by Vivaldi. Step into the lively world of music as you have fun hanging out at the vegetable garden!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Meet the clever little teapot, short and stout. It has a little handle and spout, and when it sings and whistles, just pour it out.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: It's Robbie's birthday and everyone has come to celebrate with him _ Toto, Dolly, the ducks, Horse, Elephant and Cow. Come join the celebration as they all sing him a birthday song, eat cake and enjoy his gift.

programs.title: Good Night Teddy Bear
programs.description: Teddy is getting ready for bed! He tells Mama Bear about his adventures with dad while sailing on a boat! FinFin the dolphin comes to the rescue after Teddy's tractor falls in the water along with dad's sunglasses! Join FinFin as he takes Teddy on a journey underwater! Enjoy the fish, corals and special shells!

programs.title: Bath Tubbies
programs.description: Ducky, Ellie and Froggy are having fun sailing on a raft! The sun is tired and so are the friends that head back home! What's the round and white reflection in the water? It's the moon! Join the friends as they play and dance with the moon along with his sparkling stars!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Toto, Robbie and Dolly are all busy baking a cake! After pouring all the ingredients in the pan Robbie uses his hand as a whip to whip them all up. Come see as they take the cake out of the oven and top it with sprinkles!

programs.title: Grandpa Joe's Magical Playground
programs.description: Join Grandpa Joe and friends to see the surprise they build with magical parts! Connect the blocks and parts to create a terrific tree house! Come along, climb up the ladder and have lots of fun in the tree house!

programs.title: Happy Lights
programs.description: Soothing music along with images from our surroundings is sure to put your little ones to sleep.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: London Bridge is falling down and everyone is here to help out _ Lola, Charlie, Draco, Ollie, Billy and Bam Bam.

programs.title: LaLe Ki LoLu
programs.description: Lale and Lolu find themselves in the colorful Viking world. As they sail on their Viking ships they discover the water has disappeared. A giant Viking comes to the rescue!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: The brave mouse wants to join his friend the bird on the cuckoo clock. He tries climbing, jumping, and flying until he finally manages to unite with his friend.

programs.title: Musical Melody
programs.description: Join the musicians as they play beautiful sounds of Presto by Mozart. Step into the lively world of music as you have fun riding at the playground.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Come pick potatoes with your favorite BabyTV friends _ Hippo, elephant, Squirrel, Rabbit and Baby!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Baby butterfly picks roses and meets friends along the way _ Hippo, Elephant, Turtle and more. Careful not to sneeze!

programs.title: Good Night Teddy Bear
programs.description: Teddy is getting ready for bed and tells Mama Bear about the new pair of running shoes that Grandpa bought him! Come along and enjoy the wonderful places he runs to with his fast shoes! See the Great Pyramids of Egypt, the Leaning Tower of Pisa, the Statue of Liberty and Australia too! What a wonderful world!

programs.title: Bath Tubbies
programs.description: Ducky, Ellie and Froggy are covered with paint after painting! It's time for a bath! Join the friends as they have fun scrubbing themselves! Ducky is afraid to shampoo his hair! He doesn't want any soap to enter his eyes! Come along and see how goggles come to the rescue!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Little Cabin in the Woods is a popular and fun song that teaches toddlers and young children colors and shapes with yummy fruits. Join Baby TV's friends as they have fun learning and eating a strawberry, a banana, a plum, and an apple together.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Elephant and Baby Butterfly go on an expedition under the sea in a yellow submarine. In the sea they see a frog on a log, Squirrel watering a flowerbed, a shipwrecked pirate ship and more!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Toto and Robbie fly with their spaceship to wake up a sleepy star so it can shine through the night.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Rabbit Jack leaves his front door open and catches a cold. He can't stop sneezing. His good friend Elephant makes him a hot cup of tea.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Little Lola and Charlie have fun with the animals on the farm. Join them in this classic rendition of Old McDonald. Don't forget to "moo moo" and "oink oink"!

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Charlie, Lola and all their animal friends come together in this fun and humorous rendition of The Farmer in the Dell.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: All My Friends is a fun and cheerful children's rhyme with Lola, Charlie, Henry, Oliver, and Draco signing happily together about friends.

programs.title: Close Your Eyes
programs.description: Close your eyes, sit back, and relax. It's time to go to bed.

programs.title: Good Night!
programs.description: Say good night to the day and recharge yourself with a good night's sleep.

programs.title: Milky Way
programs.description: Time to take it slow and relax.

programs.title: Milky Way
programs.description: Time to take it slow and relax.

programs.title: Twilight
programs.description: Time to unwind from the day's activities and get ready for bed.

programs.title: Shooting Star
programs.description: A relaxing journey with BabyTV's loveable charcters.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: "One, two, buckle my shoe; Three, four, shut the door…" Counting is the best! Let's join Charlie & the Numbers in this popular and cheerful song and count from one to ten.

programs.title: Songs & Rhymes
programs.description: Elephant, Giraffe, Sheep and Baby wash, iron and mend their clothes, sweep and scrub the floor and bake bread. And then they all go round the mulberry bush on a cold and frosty morning!

programs.title: Ocean
programs.description: Four landscape episodes present a blend of nature and imagination. Join us on a peaceful stroll along a serene river bank, a flowering field or amid the Ocean's coral reefs.

programs.title: Review
programs.description: Koje igre su vrijedne igranja, a koje nisu? Isplati li se za neko ostvarenje platiti punu cijenu i igrati ga odmah ili je možda pametnije čekati neku rasprodaju? Odgovore na ova pitanja donosimo u emisiji ReView, u kojoj recenziramo najnovije i najaktuelnije naslove sa cjelokupne gaming scene.

programs.title: Warm Up
programs.description: Pridružite se našim iskusnim gejmerima koji će se okušati u novim izdanjima videoigara i pritom testirati svoje gejmerske vještine.

programs.title: Intermeco
programs.description: Napravite kratku pauzu od našeg programa i uživajte u prizorima i zvucima koje nudi emisija "Intermeco".

programs.title: Škola gaminga
programs.description: Predstavljamo vam "vodič" za video igre u kome može naučiti sve o video igrama što vas je zanimalo a niste imali gdje da saznate.

programs.title: Intermeco
programs.description: Napravite kratku pauzu od našeg programa i uživajte u prizorima i zvucima koje nudi emisija "Intermeco".

programs.title: First Level
programs.description: Ćao, newbie! Dobro došao u šareni, zabavni, uzdubljivi svijet video-igara. Mi smo tu smo da skupa s tobom prođemo prvi nivo kuvanja igara o kojima svi tvoji drugari pričaju. "First Level" je emisija za nama najdraže gledaoce – Kuvo klince. To su, znate, one djevojčice i dječaci sa krupnim očima, milion neočekivanih pitanja (u minuti) i glavom punom neviđeno maštovitih ideja. Ako si jedan od tih klinaca ili znaš jednog takvog, pridruži nam se da zajedno trčimo, skačemo i vozimo se luckastim svjetovima igara, ali i pričamo o važnim temama – od toga kako se sačuvati od bullyja na netu do toga zašto je bleja na igralištu u kraju važna za svakog pravog gejmera. Parkiraj se pred TV, zgrabi daljinski i prebaci na Kuvo TV – počinje tvoj prvi nivo!

programs.title: Push Play
programs.description: Spadaš u elitnu grupu hardcore gejmera, čijim venama teku pikseli? Umjesto kiseonika udišeš čisti gejming, a ovisna si o ogromnoj količini informacija i trejlera za igre, do čijeg izlaska nestrpljivo brojiš minute i sekunde? Dosta ti je lutanja bespućima YouTube-a i kojekakvih stranica u potrazi za novim, tek izašlim najavama za dolazeće naslove? Ništa ne brigaj, jer Kuvo TV je tu da za tebe iskopa najkul video-sadržaj iz cijelog gejming univerzuma! Svake sedmice čeka te 15 minuta čistog adrenalina uz četiri, pet, šest, ponekad i više svježe izašlih indie i mainstream trejlera, uz koje ćeš se osjećati kao u bioskopu, dok čekaš početak svog omiljenog filma – možeš čak i prifurati kokice!

programs.title: TOP
programs.description: Ako tragaš za brzim, dinamičnim i preciznim preporukama šta obavezno zaigrati (i šta nikako ni upaliti), priključi nam se petkom i nedjeljom u 14.15 časova. Na visini zadatka, na vrhu gejminga, odakle imamo najbolji pogled na svaku igru – u emisiji "TOP…". Donosimo preporuke 10 najboljih igara proteklog mjeseca ili 10 najava od kojih najviše očekujemo. Upozoravamo na 5 propasti koje prosto ne vrijede tog novca ili 7 katastrofa koje imaju toliko bugova da oni s visokim pritiskom ne treba da ih uzimaju u ruke prije nego što konsultuju svog ljekara (ili farmaceuta). Rangiramo nastavke franšiza od najgorih do najboljih, izdvajamo najkvalitetnije iz svakog žanra i sklapamo hrpu drugih lista za gejmere svih uzrasta i interesovanja. Spreman? Krećemo za 10, 9, 7, 8…

programs.title: Indie Intro
programs.description: Ispod slatkastog krema AAA igara, gigantskih marketinških budžeta i naslova za koje su i tvoji roditelji čuli, a možda ih i zaigrali, skriva se pravo more kreativnosti, originalnosti i čistog duha video-igara. Da, govorimo o indie sceni! U podrumima nezavisnih developera, zagušljivim kancelarijama malenih studija i živahnim timovima talentovanih slobodnih strijelaca, svakog dana nastaju stotine novih igara, od kojih mnoge imaju mind-blowing koncepte, dosad neviđena rješenja i ideje toliko uvrnute da su na granici između jednostavno ludog i potpuno genijalnog. Ako se bojiš da ćeš se izgubiti u tom moru nepoznatih naslova, ne brini, ovdje smo, u svojim gejmerskim odajama, da serviramo najbolji ulov. Kao što istinski filmofili bježe od blockbustera, a ljubitelji muzike se klone YouTube trendinga, tako i pravi gejming sladokusci znaju gdje su najbolji gejming specijaliteti. Čekiraj ih i javi utiske!

programs.title: Playcast
programs.description: Dobrodošli u "Playcast!", vaš ultimativni vodič kroz sve što je važno u svetu video igara! Bilo da ste strastveni gamer ili samo povremeni igrač, podcast koji vam donosi PLAY Zine pruža informacije o aktuelnim temama i ekskluzivne intervjue s poznatim developerima, streamerima, esport igračima i gaming influenserima.

programs.title: Review
programs.description: Koje igre su vrijedne igranja, a koje nisu? Isplati li se za neko ostvarenje platiti punu cijenu i igrati ga odmah ili je možda pametnije čekati neku rasprodaju? Odgovore na ova pitanja donosimo u emisiji ReView, u kojoj recenziramo najnovije i najaktuelnije naslove sa cjelokupne gaming scene.

programs.title: Girl Gaming Show
programs.description: Girl Gaming Show je podcast show u kojem istražujemo svet igara iz ženske perspektive. Pridružite nam se dok istražujemo sve aspekte gaming sveta, od najnovijih igara do izazova u razvoju igara. Budite deo naše zajednice koja slavi ženski uticaj u gamingu!

programs.title: Škola gaminga
programs.description: Predstavljamo vam "vodič" za video igre u kome može naučiti sve o video igrama što vas je zanimalo a niste imali gdje da saznate.

programs.title: Popcorn time
programs.description: Popcorn time je brza i dinamična emisija, u kojoj vam otkrivamo najvažnije novosti iz svijeta filma. Očekuju vas zanimljivosti i aktuelnosti sa kinematografske scene. Donosimo vam pregled novih i najgledanijih filmskih ostvarenja, otkrivamo koje filmove možete pogledati u domaćim bioskopima, a tu je i naša filmska preporuka koju ne smijete propustiti.

programs.title: GG INFO
programs.description: GG INFO je informativno zabavna emisija u kojoj vam donosimo sedmični presjek naznačajnijih vijesti i aktuelnosti sa mainstream gaming scene po izboru urednika GoodGame.hr Gaming Portala.

programs.title: Playcon
programs.description: Play!Con je konferencija posvećena game developerima iz Srbije i regiona. Od 2020. godine pa do danas održano je ukupno osam skupova, gde je organizator Play! ugostio mnoštvo predavača iz svih oblasti razvoja video igara. Gledaoce očekuju zanimljivi intervjui koji će pokriti širok spektar tema _ od svakodnevnih izazova rada u industriji do inspirativnih priča o autorskim projektima regionalnih gejming studija.

programs.title: ReWind
programs.description: Zanima vas koji filmovi i TV serije uskoro dolaze? Bez brige, jer emisija ReWind je tu da vam predstavi najnovije i najatraktivnije trailere nadolazećih filmskih i TV ostvarenja. Očekuje vas 15-minutno putovanje kroz najaktuelnije trailere sedmice!

programs.title: IN the ZONE
programs.description: Emisija "In the zone" donosi izvještaje sa gejmerskih događaja, recenzije novih izdanja videoigara i druge zanimljivosti iz svijeta gejminga.

programs.title: Unbox.IT
programs.description: Jesi li se nekada zapitao da li je ovaj budžetski set dobar deal ili bacanje love... ili kako to izgleda vrhunski gaming laptop? Mi imamo odgovore! Svake srijede "unboxamo" i ocjenjujemo razne hardverske proizvode (od konzola i periferija, do telefona i laptopa)... Bez dlake na jeziku i milosti!

programs.description: Zanima vas koji filmovi i TV serije uskoro dolaze? Bez brige, jer emisija ReWind je tu da vam predstavi najnovije i najatraktivnije trailere nadolazećih filmskih i TV ostvarenja. Očekuje vas 15-minutno putovanje kroz najaktuelnije trailere sedmice!

programs.title: Let's Play
programs.description: Raspoložen si da upoznaš prvi sat gameplay-a, pogledaš Walkthrough najboljih igara, ili jednostavno se opustiš uz Clash. Onda je Let's Play najbolji mogući izbor za tebe.

programs.title: Review
programs.description: Koje igre su vrijedne igranja, a koje nisu? Isplati li se za neko ostvarenje platiti punu cijenu i igrati ga odmah ili je možda pametnije čekati neku rasprodaju? Odgovore na ova pitanja donosimo u emisiji ReView, u kojoj recenziramo najnovije i najaktuelnije naslove sa cjelokupne gaming scene.

programs.title: GG INFO
programs.description: GG INFO je informativno zabavna emisija u kojoj vam donosimo sedmični presjek naznačajnijih vijesti i aktuelnosti sa mainstream gaming scene po izboru urednika GoodGame.hr Gaming Portala.

programs.title: ReWind
programs.description: Zanima vas koji filmovi i TV serije uskoro dolaze? Bez brige, jer emisija ReWind je tu da vam predstavi najnovije i najatraktivnije trailere nadolazećih filmskih i TV ostvarenja. Očekuje vas 15-minutno putovanje kroz najaktuelnije trailere sedmice!

programs.title: RetroVision
programs.description: Ako i dalje čuvaš svoj Commodore na najvišoj polici ili brkatog Italijana Marija pamtiš kao jednog od najboljih drugara iz djetinjstva – nacrtaj se pred Kuvo TV-om i uskoči u naš vremeplov u prošlost gejminga. "RetroVision" te vodi u bližu i dalju prošlost video-igara i na dokumentarno-zabavan način podsjeća ili otkriva kako je svijet igara nekada izgledao. Svaka emisija posvećena je određenom periodu ili igri koja je na neki način obilježila istoriju, uz hrpu specijala koje čuvamo u svojim ladicama. Baci pogled u prošlost najzabavnije industrije i vidjećeš priče koje iskusnim gejmerima uvijek bude emocije, a mlađima otkrivaju kultne igre, rodonačelnike današnjih hitova.

programs.title: Push Play
programs.description: Spadaš u elitnu grupu hardcore gejmera, čijim venama teku pikseli? Umjesto kiseonika udišeš čisti gejming, a ovisna si o ogromnoj količini informacija i trejlera za igre, do čijeg izlaska nestrpljivo brojiš minute i sekunde? Dosta ti je lutanja bespućima YouTube-a i kojekakvih stranica u potrazi za novim, tek izašlim najavama za dolazeće naslove? Ništa ne brigaj, jer Kuvo TV je tu da za tebe iskopa najkul video-sadržaj iz cijelog gejming univerzuma! Svake sedmice čeka te 15 minuta čistog adrenalina uz četiri, pet, šest, ponekad i više svježe izašlih indie i mainstream trejlera, uz koje ćeš se osjećati kao u bioskopu, dok čekaš početak svog omiljenog filma – možeš čak i prifurati kokice!

programs.title: TOP
programs.description: Ako tragaš za brzim, dinamičnim i preciznim preporukama šta obavezno zaigrati (i šta nikako ni upaliti), priključi nam se petkom i nedjeljom u 14.15 časova. Na visini zadatka, na vrhu gejminga, odakle imamo najbolji pogled na svaku igru – u emisiji "TOP…". Donosimo preporuke 10 najboljih igara proteklog mjeseca ili 10 najava od kojih najviše očekujemo. Upozoravamo na 5 propasti koje prosto ne vrijede tog novca ili 7 katastrofa koje imaju toliko bugova da oni s visokim pritiskom ne treba da ih uzimaju u ruke prije nego što konsultuju svog ljekara (ili farmaceuta). Rangiramo nastavke franšiza od najgorih do najboljih, izdvajamo najkvalitetnije iz svakog žanra i sklapamo hrpu drugih lista za gejmere svih uzrasta i interesovanja. Spreman? Krećemo za 10, 9, 7, 8…

programs.title: GG INFO
programs.description: GG INFO je informativno zabavna emisija u kojoj vam donosimo sedmični presjek naznačajnijih vijesti i aktuelnosti sa mainstream gaming scene po izboru urednika GoodGame.hr Gaming Portala.

Odgovore na ova pitanja donosimo u emisiji ReView, u kojoj recenziramo najnovije i najaktuelnije naslove sa cjelokupne gaming scene.

programs.title: Unbox.IT
programs.description: Jesi li se nekada zapitao da li je ovaj budžetski set dobar deal ili bacanje love... ili kako to izgleda vrhunski gaming laptop? Mi imamo odgovore! Svake srijede "unboxamo" i ocjenjujemo razne hardverske proizvode (od konzola i periferija, do telefona i laptopa)... Bez dlake na jeziku i milosti!

programs.title: Život i smrt porno bande
programs.description: Život i smrt porno bande je srpski horor-dramski film iz 2009. godine u režiji i po scenariju Mladena Đorđevića. Film prati mladog reditelja, koji okuplja grupu porno glumaca i glumica i sa njima kreće po srpskim selima, gde najpre izvode porno predstave, ali se zatim preorijentišu na snimanja snuff filmova.

programs.title: Hitac
programs.description: Jedan hitac poveže dve u potpunosti različite žene _ Anitu, inspektoricu koja se sjajno snalazi u profesionalnom i sasvim dobro u privatnom životu i Petru, mladu devojku kojoj bi svakodnevica sigurno bila jednostavnija da ne mora brinuti za majku alkoholičarku. Istraga oko slučajnog hitca ispreplest će sudbine Anite i Petre u trenutku kada obadve doznaju da su trudne. Na velikim prekretnicama, svaka u svome svetu i jednako prepuštene same sebi, ove će dve žene, korak po korak, tokom istrage postati bliske. Nisu to planirale, nisu to ni htele, dogodilo se slučajno. A ta će slučajnost promeniti smerove kojima su planirale krenuti.

programs.title: Pegava devojka
programs.description: Vesela devojka Keti juri kroz gradski život i u toj trci vara sve koje sretne, a ponekad i sebe. Tako ona slučajno upada u društvo dvojice provalnika koji vrše krađu u kojoj ona nesvesno učestvuje. Kada policija krene da ih juri, ona saznaje o čemu se radi, i preuzimajući inicijativu, predlaže da se sakriju kod dvojice starih glumaca, u čijem domu situacija dobija neočekivani preokret.

programs.title: Snegovi Kilimandžara
programs.description: Dok Hari leži ranjen i omamljen u afričkom kampu u podnožju snežnih padina planine Kilimandžaro, on se seća događaja iz svog života vraćajući se u prošlost. Pisanje, žene i lov _ sve su to stvari koje su odredile njegov život i dominirale njime. U potrazi za njima, proputovao je svet od salona boemskog Pariza, španskih ratišta do afričkih ravnica. Sada, u senci velike planine i pod pretnjom smrću od gangrene, pokušava da shvati svoje neuspehe.

programs.title: Kozara
programs.description: U junu 1942. godine, Nemci i njihovi saradnici krenuli su u ofanzivu protiv partizana i njihovih štabova u šumama planine Kozare u severnoj Bosni. Jake neprijateljske snage stežu obruč oko Kozare, a partizani pokušavaju da se probiju. Otežava ih to što moraju da se brinu o ranjenicima i izbeglicama, pa se male grupe odlučuju da se sakriju u zemunicama, nadajući se da će ih nemačko krčenje polja mimoići.

programs.title: Vrtlog
programs.description: Prva priča nosi naziv "Otac". Nemci skupljaju taoce, seljake sa okolnih polja. Jedan starac moli oficira da mu oslobodi sinove. Oficir mu nudi da oslobodi samo jednog, a ostali će na streljanje. Druga priča se zove "Močvara". Dva su partizana u močvari, u neprijateljskom obruču. Jedan od njih je ranjen, a drugi ga želi po svaku cenu spasiti. Treća priča se zove "Ada" i ona govori o igri sudbine, kada se na suprotnim stranama nišana nađu otac i sin.

programs.title: Goli otok
programs.description: Dokumentarni film o ostrvu u Jadranskom moru koje je između 1949. i 1956. godine služilo kao zatvor za političke protivnike, odnosno one koji su podržavali Informbiro i Sovjetski Savez.

programs.title: Devojka sa Kosmaja
programs.description: Rat razdvaja dvoje zaljubljenih. Devojka se opredeljuje za partizane. Ratujući, ona traga za svojim mladićem i konačno saznaje da pripada suprotnoj strani. U jednoj akciji mladi partizan koji je u nju zaljubljen, da bi je zaštitio, bude ranjen i umire na njenim rukama. Devojka sa Kosmaja, razapeta između dve ljubavi, ne doživljava nijednu.

programs.title: Galeb
programs.description: Ovo je priča o legendarnom brodu kojim je Tito putovao 14 puta, posetivši 18 zemalja na tri kontinenta. Na tim putovanjima dogovorio je Pokret nesvrstanih, najveći svetski savez zemalja nakon Ujedinjenih nacija, tadašnji treći blok Hladnog rata. Jugoslavija je bila lider Nesvrstanih, a Tito njihov vođa. Ovaj čuveni brod nedavno je obnovljen i danas je turistička atrakcija grada Rijeke.

programs.title: Robna kuća
programs.description: Svojevrsna televizijska enciklopedija zajedničkog nasleđa. Predstavlja činjenice, urbane legende, mitove, pojave, skrivene detalje. Serija prati prve dodire zapadne kulture ranih pedesetih na festivalima zabavne muzike, zatim novi talas, partizanske spektakle, uspehe Bijelog Dugmeta, komedije Duška Kovačevića i osvajanje Kupa šampiona.

programs.title: Robna kuća
programs.description: Svojevrsna televizijska enciklopedija zajedničkog nasleđa. Predstavlja činjenice, urbane legende, mitove, pojave, skrivene detalje. Serija prati prve dodire zapadne kulture ranih pedesetih na festivalima zabavne muzike, zatim novi talas, partizanske spektakle, uspehe Bijelog Dugmeta, komedije Duška Kovačevića i osvajanje Kupa šampiona.

programs.title: Robna kuća
programs.description: Svojevrsna televizijska enciklopedija zajedničkog nasleđa. Predstavlja činjenice, urbane legende, mitove, pojave, skrivene detalje. Serija prati prve dodire zapadne kulture ranih pedesetih na festivalima zabavne muzike, zatim novi talas, partizanske spektakle, uspehe Bijelog Dugmeta, komedije Duška Kovačevića i osvajanje Kupa šampiona.

programs.title: Samac u braku
programs.description: Radnja serije smještena je u mali Vojvođanski grad i prati život uspješnog mladog odvjetnika, najpoželjnijeg neženje, Radmila Tomića. Radmilova ženidba sa nepoznatom Beograđankom izaziva veliki interes i razne komentare. Međutim, nitko ni ne sluti da se iza prividne slike idilične ljubavi i bračne sreće krije velika drama mladog para.

programs.title: Čitulja za Eskobara
programs.description: "Čitulja za Eskobara" na duhovit način kroz vrlo komičnu situaciju opisuje srpski kriminalni milje, podzemlje čiji su članovi mahom teški primitivci, jedva školovani ljudi sa oružjem u ruci i psovkama na usnama, međusobno povezani zločinima, no neka prijateljstva datiraju još od školskih klupa. Gandi je kriminalac, od detinjstva predodređen za negativca. On upoznaje Lelu, zagonetnu devojku, u koju se zaljubljuje. Istog dana kada Gandi ubija kriminalca koga zovu Srpski Eskobar, dva narkofila i neradnika, Deki i Baki, daju čitulju pravom Eskobaru. Policija počinje istragu, situacija se komplikuje i obrće u neverovatnom smeru.

programs.title: Klan
programs.description: "Klan" je serija autora Bobana Skerlića koja, u osam epizoda, dramskim i tragikomičnim tonom prikazuje dva provincijalna probisveta i njihovo probijanje do vrha podzemlja. Zamišljena je kao savremena akciona drama furioznog ritma, kao jedan dubok i do sada neviđen uvid u samo srce kriminalnih organizacija i njihovih mnogobrojnih poslova.

programs.title: Opklada
programs.description: U seoskom mlinu, sa nekoliko radnika, živi stariji poslovođa sa mladom ženom. Ona ga napušta i odlazi u grad da traži šofera, koji je poslom svratio u selo, uneo nemir među supružnike i u mladoj ženi probudio ljubav. Tragajući za njim upoznala je svet periferije i ponižena se vraća mužu.

programs.title: Ortaci
programs.description: Priča o malim ljudima koji svoju egzistenciju pokušavaju da obezbede na periferiji velikog grada, u miljeu pijačnog "podzemlja", sumnjivih privatnih inicijativa, sitnih prevaranata i nerealnih ambicija. U taj svet stiže mladić iz provincije sa namerom da studira. Ali, umesto studija, on se upušta u sumnjive poslove sa svojim zemljacima, probisvetima, doživljavajući razne zgode i nezgode u potrazi za lakom zaradom...

programs.title: Siroma' sam al' sam besan
programs.description: U zabačenom vojvođanskom selu seljaci žele da otvore klanicu. Berberin, postaje važna ličnost i delegat fabrike. I kad se čini da je berberin uspeo u životu, njegova devojka umire, vlasti odbijaju zahtev za klanicu, a seljaci ga bojkotuju. Tada napušta selo sa pevačicom kako bi pokušao sve iz početka

programs.title: Klan
programs.description: "Klan" je serija autora Bobana Skerlića koja, u osam epizoda, dramskim i tragikomičnim tonom prikazuje dva provincijalna probisveta i njihovo probijanje do vrha podzemlja. Zamišljena je kao savremena akciona drama furioznog ritma, kao jedan dubok i do sada neviđen uvid u samo srce kriminalnih organizacija i njihovih mnogobrojnih poslova.

programs.title: Isterivači duhova
programs.description: Piter Venkman (Bil Marej), Rej Stanc (Dan Ejkrojd) i Egon Špengler (Harold Ramis) su tri istraživača na Univerzitetu Kolumbija u Njujorku. Nakon što stipendija istekne, momci dobijaju otkaz i osnivaju kompaniju za isterivanje duhova pod nazivom Ghost Ekorcists. Njihova prva mušterija je violončelistkinja Dana Baret (Sigurni Viver), koju je duh isterao iz njenog stana na 22. spratu nebodera u okrugu Central Park Vest. Izgleda da i Danin komšija Luis Tuli (Rik Moranis) takođe ima problema sa čudnim dešavanjima u zgradi. Naoružani protonskim puškama, Isterivači duhova postaju izuzetno popularni i pridružuje im se Vinston Zedmor (Erni Hadson), koji traži dobro plaćen posao.

programs.title: Uzbuna: Jedinica za nestale osobe
programs.description: "Uzbuna: Jedinica za nestale osobe" je proceduralna drama smeštena u jedinicu za nestala lica (MPU) Policijske uprave Filadelfije. Svaka epizoda uključuje potragu na život ili smrt za nestalom osobom na čijem čelu se nalaze detektivi Džejson Grant i Niki Batista. Zajedno sa timom MPU, njihov posao je da pronađu nestale ili otete i ponovo ih spoje sa njihovim najmilijima.

programs.description: Čarliju nedostaje Džejk i on iznenađuje čak i sebe samog kad pita Džejka i Alana da žive sa njim. Iako imaju klimav odnos, obojica vole Džejka i žele da mu bude dobro. Zajedno, ova dva i po muškarca, bore se sa odrastanjem.

programs.title: Dva i po muškarca
programs.description: Džejk je hranio galebove i "zaboravio" da zatvori vrata. Gomila ptica ušla je u kuću. Sad Čarli mora da disciplinuje Džejka, ali ne zna kako. Zato odlučuje da ignoriše Džejka. U međuvremenu, Alan dobija iznenađenje od Džudit.

programs.title: Tragač
programs.description: Kolter Šo putuje državom u svom kamperu i pomaže policiji i građanima da reše kriminalne slučajeve i pronađu nestale osobe. Međutim, Kolterov najnoviji slučaj sve menja iz korena.
